languages.text: "Если сам{mf||а} {g|Encyclopedia:RogueTrader}Вольный Торговец{/g} замолвит за меня словечко перед служителями Адептус Администратум, я бы могла стать официальным торговым представителем {g|Encyclopedia:Imperium}Империума{/g}. Только представьте — клочок бумаги обеспечит мне и моим агентам защиту от происков ашмагов куда более надежную, чем любой щит-рефрактор! И даже слугам Инквизитора придется со мной считаться, ибо я сама стану представителем закона".

traits.locale_text: "Если сам{mf||а} {g|Encyclopedia:RogueTrader}Вольный Торговец{/g} замолвит за меня словечко перед служителями Адептус Администратум, я бы могла стать официальным торговым представителем {g|Encyclopedia:Imperium}Империума{/g}. Только представьте — клочок бумаги обеспечит мне и моим агентам защиту от происков ашмагов куда более надежную, чем любой щит-рефрактор! И даже слугам Инквизитора придется со мной считаться, ибо я сама стану представителем закона".
traits.speaker: JaeCompanion

languages.text: "If the {g|Encyclopedia:RogueTrader}Rogue Trader{/g} put in a good word for me with the servants of the Adeptus Administratum, I could become an official trade representative of the {g|Encyclopedia:Imperium}Imperium{/g}. Just imagine it — a little scrap of paper will offer me and my agents protection against ashmag schemes, far better than any refractor field! And even the Inquisition will have to think twice before they mess with me, because I'll be a representative of the law in my own right."
languages.original_text: "Если сам{mf||а} {g|Encyclopedia:RogueTrader}Вольный Торговец{/g} замолвит за меня словечко перед служителями Адептус Администратум, я бы могла стать официальным торговым представителем {g|Encyclopedia:Imperium}Империума{/g}. Только представьте — клочок бумаги обеспечит мне и моим агентам защиту от происков ашмагов куда более надежную, чем любой щит-рефрактор! И даже слугам Инквизитора придется со мной считаться, ибо я сама стану представителем закона".

Just imagine it — a little scrap of paper will offer me and my agents protection against ashmag schemes, far better than any refractor field! And even the Inquisition will have to think twice before they mess with me, because I'll be a representative of the law in my own right."
traits.speaker: JaeCompanion

languages.text: “只要{g|Encyclopedia:RogueTrader}行商浪人{/g}能在帝国内政部的仆人面前为我说些好话，我就可以成为{g|Encyclopedia:Imperium}帝国{/g}的官方贸易代表。想象一下，只要一张小小的废纸，就可以让我和我的代理人得到保护，不再受那些坏种的影响。这比任何防护立场都有用得多！就算是审判庭的人，招惹我之前也会三思而后行，因为我是帝国的合法代表，拥有我自己的权利。”
languages.original_text: "If the {g|Encyclopedia:RogueTrader}Rogue Trader{/g} put in a good word for me with the servants of the Adeptus Administratum, I could become an official trade representative of the {g|Encyclopedia:Imperium}Imperium{/g}. Just imagine it — a little scrap of paper will offer me and my agents protection against ashmag schemes, far better than any refractor field! And even the Inquisition will have to think twice before they mess with me, because I'll be a representative of the law in my own right."

traits.locale_text: “只要{g|Encyclopedia:RogueTrader}行商浪人{/g}能在帝国内政部的仆人面前为我说些好话，我就可以成为{g|Encyclopedia:Imperium}帝国{/g}的官方贸易代表。想象一下，只要一张小小的废纸，就可以让我和我的代理人得到保护，不再受那些坏家伙的影响。这比任何防护立场都有用得多！就算是审判庭的人，招惹我之前也会三思而后行，因为我是帝国的合法代表，拥有我自己的权利。”
traits.speaker: JaeCompanion

languages.text: «Si {mf|el|la} {g|Encyclopedia:RogueTrader}Comerciante Independiente{/g} habla bien de mí a los sirvientes del Adeptus Administratum, podría convertirme en una representante comercial oficial del {g|Encyclopedia:Imperium}Imperium{/g}. Imagíneselo: ¡un trozo de papel nos protegerá a mí y a mis agentes mejor que un campo refractor contra todas las maquinaciones de esos ashmags! E incluso la Inquisición tendrá que pensárselo antes de ir a por mí, porque yo también seré una representante de la ley».
languages.original_text: "If the {g|Encyclopedia:RogueTrader}Rogue Trader{/g} put in a good word for me with the servants of the Adeptus Administratum, I could become an official trade representative of the {g|Encyclopedia:Imperium}Imperium{/g}. Just imagine it — a little scrap of paper will offer me and my agents protection against ashmag schemes, far better than any refractor field! And even the Inquisition will have to think twice before they mess with me, because I'll be a representative of the law in my own right."

traits.locale_text: «Si {mf|el|la} {g|Encyclopedia:RogueTrader}Comerciante Independiente{/g} habla bien de mí a los sirvientes del Adeptus Administratum, podría convertirme en una representante comercial oficial del {g|Encyclopedia:Imperium}Imperium{/g}. Imagíneselo: ¡un trozo de papel nos protegerá a mí y a mis agentes mejor que un campo refractor contra todas las maquinaciones de esos ashmags! E incluso la Inquisición tendrá que pensárselo antes de ir a por mí, porque yo también seré una representante de la ley».
traits.speaker: JaeCompanion

languages.text: 「もし{g|Encyclopedia:RogueTrader}自由開拓者{/g}があたしを帝国行政局の従者に推薦してくれるなら、{g|Encyclopedia:Imperium}帝国{/g}を代表して正式に貿易ができるでしょう。考えてみて―小さな紙切れ一枚で、あたしと仲間をアッシュマグの陰謀から守れるの、どんなリフラクター・フィールドよりも優れものだわ！異端審問庁でさえ、まっとうな方法で法の代表者になったあたしには手を出す前に考え直さざるを得なくなるのよ」
languages.original_text: "If the {g|Encyclopedia:RogueTrader}Rogue Trader{/g} put in a good word for me with the servants of the Adeptus Administratum, I could become an official trade representative of the {g|Encyclopedia:Imperium}Imperium{/g}. Just imagine it — a little scrap of paper will offer me and my agents protection against ashmag schemes, far better than any refractor field! And even the Inquisition will have to think twice before they mess with me, because I'll be a representative of the law in my own right."

traits.locale_text: 「もし{g|Encyclopedia:RogueTrader}自由開拓者{/g}があたしを帝国行政局の従者に推薦してくれるなら、{g|Encyclopedia:Imperium}帝国{/g}を代表して正式に貿易ができるでしょう。考えてみて―小さな紙切れ一枚で、あたしと仲間をアッシュマグの陰謀から守れるの、どんなリフラクター・フィールドよりも優れものだわ！異端審問庁でさえ、まっとうな方法で法の代表者になったあたしには手を出す前に考え直さざるを得なくなるのよ」
traits.speaker: JaeCompanion

languages.text: « Si {mf|le|la} {g|Encyclopedia:RogueTrader}libre-{mf|marchand|marchande}{/g} appuyait ma candidature auprès de l'Adeptus Administratum, je pourrais devenir la représentante commerciale officielle de l'{g|Encyclopedia:Imperium}Imperium{/g}. Imaginez un peu... Munis de ce petit bout de papier, mes agents et moi-même serions à l'abri des viles manigances des ashmags, plus encore qu'avec un champ réfracteur ! L'Inquisition elle-même y réfléchirait à deux fois avant de me chercher des poux dès lors que j'aurais la loi de mon côté. »
languages.original_text: "If the {g|Encyclopedia:RogueTrader}Rogue Trader{/g} put in a good word for me with the servants of the Adeptus Administratum, I could become an official trade representative of the {g|Encyclopedia:Imperium}Imperium{/g}. Just imagine it — a little scrap of paper will offer me and my agents protection against ashmag schemes, far better than any refractor field! And even the Inquisition will have to think twice before they mess with me, because I'll be a representative of the law in my own right."

traits.locale_text: « Si {mf|le|la} {g|Encyclopedia:RogueTrader}libre-{mf|marchand|marchande}{/g} appuyait ma candidature auprès de l'Adeptus Administratum, je pourrais devenir la représentante commerciale officielle de l'{g|Encyclopedia:Imperium}Imperium{/g}. Imaginez un peu... Munis de ce petit bout de papier, mes agents et moi-même serions à l'abri des viles manigances des ashmags, plus encore qu'avec un champ réfracteur ! L'Inquisition elle-même y réfléchirait à deux fois avant de me chercher des poux dès lors que j'aurais la loi de mon côté. »
traits.speaker: JaeCompanion

languages.text: "Wenn {g|Encyclopedia:RogueTrader}{mf|der Freihändler|die Freihändlerin}{/g} bei den Dienern des Adeptus Administratum ein gutes Wort für mich einlegt, könnte ich eine offizielle Handelsvertreterin des {g|Encyclopedia:Imperium}Imperiums{/g} werden. Stellt Euch nur vor – ein kleines Stück Papier gewährt mir und meinen Agenten Schutz vor Ashmag-Komplotten, viel besser als jedes Refraktorfeld! Und selbst die Inquisition muss zweimal nachdenken, bevor sie sich mit mir anlegt, weil auch ich auf meine Art das Gesetz repräsentiere."
languages.original_text: "If the {g|Encyclopedia:RogueTrader}Rogue Trader{/g} put in a good word for me with the servants of the Adeptus Administratum, I could become an official trade representative of the {g|Encyclopedia:Imperium}Imperium{/g}. Just imagine it — a little scrap of paper will offer me and my agents protection against ashmag schemes, far better than any refractor field! And even the Inquisition will have to think twice before they mess with me, because I'll be a representative of the law in my own right."

traits.locale_text: "Wenn {mf|der Freihändler|die Freihändlerin} bei den Dienern des Adeptus Administratum ein gutes Wort für mich einlegt, könnte ich eine offizielle Handelsvertreterin des {g|Encyclopedia:Imperium}Imperiums{/g} werden. Stellt Euch nur vor – ein kleines Stück Papier gewährt mir und meinen Agenten Schutz vor Ashmag-Komplotten, viel besser als jedes Refraktorfeld! Und selbst die Inquisition muss zweimal nachdenken, bevor sie sich mit mir anlegt, weil auch ich auf meine Art das Gesetz repräsentiere."
traits.speaker: JaeCompanion

languages.text: "{g|Encyclopedia:RogueTrader}Hür Tacir{/g}, Adeptus Administratum hizmetkârlarıyla konuşup bana kefil olacak olursa {g|Encyclopedia:Imperium}İmparatorluk'un{/g} resmî ticaret temsilcilerine katılabilirim. Hayal edebiliyor musun? Ufak bir kâğıt parçası, adamlarımla beni külboğaz entrikalarından ışıkkıran alanlarına kıyasla daha fazla koruyacak! Hatta kendi çapımda kanunların temsilcisi olacağım için Engizisyon bile bana bulaşmaktan tereddüt edecektir."
languages.original_text: "If the {g|Encyclopedia:RogueTrader}Rogue Trader{/g} put in a good word for me with the servants of the Adeptus Administratum, I could become an official trade representative of the {g|Encyclopedia:Imperium}Imperium{/g}. Just imagine it — a little scrap of paper will offer me and my agents protection against ashmag schemes, far better than any refractor field! And even the Inquisition will have to think twice before they mess with me, because I'll be a representative of the law in my own right."

traits.locale_text: "{g|Encyclopedia:RogueTrader}Hür Tacir{/g}, Adeptus Administratum hizmetkârlarına benim için kefil olacak olursa, {g|Encyclopedia:Imperium}İmparatorluk{/g}'un resmi ticaret temsilcilerine katılabilirim. Bunu hayal edebiliyor musun? Sadece ufak bir kâğıt parçası sayesinde, adamlarımla birlikte külboğaz entrikalarına karşı ışıkkıran alanlarından bile daha fazla güvende olabiliriz! Hatta kendi çapımda kanunların temsilcisi olacağım için, Engizisyon bile bana bulaşmadan önce tereddüt edecektir."
traits.speaker: JaeCompanion
